name: Bias and Discrimination
description: Degree to which the system is fair and unbiased, and the extent of bias monitoring and mitigation.

values.name: Fair and Unbiased
values.description: System demonstrably fair and unbiased across different groups, with ongoing monitoring and auditing for bias.

values.name: Rigorous Testing
values.description: Rigorous fairness testing using multiple metrics and bias mitigation techniques applied.

values.name: Awareness
values.description: Some awareness of potential bias, basic fairness metrics monitored, but no active mitigation.

values.name: High Risk
values.description: High risk of discriminatory outcomes, no bias detection or mitigation methods used.
